Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

HSTREAM

The basic type HSTREAM is a handle to a digital audio stream.

Discussion

HSTREAM handles are returned from the AIL_open_stream function.


Group: Basic Types
Related Functions: AILSTREAMCB, AIL_auto_service_stream, AIL_close_stream, AIL_filter_stream_attribute, AIL_open_stream, AIL_pause_stream, AIL_register_stream_callback, AIL_service_stream, AIL_set_filter_stream_preference, AIL_set_stream_loop_block, AIL_set_stream_loop_count, AIL_set_stream_ms_position, AIL_set_stream_pan, AIL_set_stream_playback_rate, AIL_set_stream_position, AIL_set_stream_processor, AIL_set_stream_reverb, AIL_set_stream_user_data, AIL_set_stream_volume, AIL_start_stream, AIL_stream_info, AIL_stream_loop_count, AIL_stream_ms_position, AIL_stream_pan, AIL_stream_playback_rate, AIL_stream_position, AIL_stream_reverb, AIL_stream_status, AIL_stream_user_data, AIL_stream_volume
